meanings.definition: To manage or direct the affairs of
meanings.sent1: The principal administers the school's daily operations.
meanings.sent2: She administers the team with fairness and efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The cat administers its territory with a strict paw.
meanings.sent4: Time administers its passage without pause.
meanings.sent5: He administers his household like a captain of a ship.

meanings.definition: To give or apply (a remedy or treatment)
meanings.sent1: The nurse administers the flu shot to patients.
meanings.sent2: He administers first aid to the injured hiker.
meanings.sent3: The clown administers laughter to the sad faces.
meanings.sent4: Kindness administers comfort to the troubled heart.
meanings.sent5: The chef administers flavor to the bland dish.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacist administers medication to customers.
meanings.sent2: She administers the ballots during the election.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine administers snacks to hungry students.
meanings.sent4: Fate administers challenges to test our strength.
meanings.sent5: The teacher administers knowledge to eager minds.
